original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon chose Gedaliah, to have authority to rule the people who were still in Judah. Gedaliah was the son of Ahikam and the grandson of Shaphan.
korean_text: 유다 땅에 머물러 있는 백성은 곧 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살이 남긴 자라 왕이 사반의 손자 아히감의 아들 그달리야가 관할하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon chose Gedaliah
to have authority to rule the people
Gedaliah was the son of Ahikam
